2c6e0af7-c012-48bb-8d69-3e60a1f2fc50.name: Snowden
2c6e0af7-c012-48bb-8d69-3e60a1f2fc50.description: Disillusioned with the intelligence community, top contractor Edward Snowden (Joseph Gordon-Levitt) leaves his job at the National Security Agency. He now knows that a virtual mountain of data is being assembled to track all forms of digital communication -- not just from foreign governments and terrorist groups, but from ordinary Americans. When Snowden decides to leak this classified information, he becomes a traitor to some, a hero to others and a fugitive from the law.
